Arguments.Name: in_OrchestratorQueueName
Arguments.Tooltip: Allows the Orchestrator queue name to be passed as an argument, instead of only being defined in the configuration file.

Arguments.Name: in_OrchestratorQueueFolder
Arguments.Tooltip: Allows the Orchestrator folder name where the queue is created to be passed as an argument, instead of only being defined in the configuration file.

Arguments.Name: in_DataGatheringMode
Arguments.Tooltip:
1 - use chrome and UI automation
2 - use API calls to https://api.londonstockexchange.com

default: 2

Arguments.Name: in_OutputPath
Arguments.Tooltip: Use this parameter to set the output file path. The default path is: "Data\Output"

Arguments.Name: in_InputPath
Arguments.Tooltip: Use this parameter to set the input file path. The default path is: "Data\Input\Input.csv"
